channel.title: Need help with a code plz
channel.description:
;D i cant code for shit lol i need help with making the npcs say we love u ashley or sumthing corny like that
if u can help me post or come to 5.172.83.118 port 43594 and talk to me there
if u help me to get them say what i want u can be co-owner
im also on hamachi in channel Evil Ash PK1 pass 123

item.title: Need help with a code plz
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

  1. Search for “Moo” at NpcHandler.java
    2.After the 2nd } after moo copy this

if (npcs.npcType == [NPC ID HERE]) {
if (misc.random2(20) == 1) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “[WHAT YOU WANT THE NPC TO SAY]”;

              }
           }

Here is an Example

if (npcs.npcType == [1234]) {
if (misc.random2(20) == 1) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “[This Is An Example]”;
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a code plz
